title: I May Destroy You
creator_credit: Lynsey Moore, Paul Cross, Simon Meyers, Simon Maloney, FALKNA Productions and Various Artists Limited
brief_description: Set in London, where gratification is only an app away, the story centers on Arabella, a carefree, self-assured Londoner with a group of great friends, a boyfriend in Italy, and a burgeoning writing career. But when her drink is spiked, she must question and rebuild every element of her life.
creator_credit_for_label: Lynsey Moore, Paul Cross, Simon Meyers, Simon Maloney, FALKNA Productions and Various Artists Limited
